alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:27PM CDT until August 06 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CALHOUN...EAST CENTRAL ETOWAH AND SOUTHERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 426 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Summerville to near Forney to Ohatchee, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Anniston, Jacksonville, Piedmont, Hokes Bluff, Centre, Cedar Bluff, Forney, Centre Municipal Airport, Gaylesville, Tennala, Pleasant Gap, Cornwall Furnace Park, Eastern Weiss Lake, Jacksonville State University, Ballplay, Moshat, Ball Flat, Western Weiss Lake, Coloma and Spring Garden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
